Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+10 d4 x2@19 R10'); Greataxe (+10 d12 x3@20); Longsword (+10 d8 x2@19); Unarmed (+10 d3 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Charisma Turning Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dodge: +1 AC
Brotherhood: +1 attack when fighting among 5+ Dorns
Drive It Deep: May suffer up to -10 attack for equal damage bonus w/a light or one-handed weapon
Improved Shield Bash: Suffers no AC penalty when using Shield Bash
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Improvised Weapon: Suffers no penalty w/improvised weapons and a -2 attack penalty for non-proficient weapons
Orc Slayer: +1 AC and melee damage vs. orcs and dworgs
Pikeman: May receive a charge as a move action
Smite: +4 attack, +10 damage 1/dy
Tunnel Fighting: Suffers no penalty to AC or attack w/a one-handed weapon when squeezing
Turn Undead: R60' May turn or rebuke 2d6+12 HD of undead creatures of up to (d20+22)/3 HD 5/dy
Two-Handed Focus: +1 attack when using a weapon two-handed

Save Notes:
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Fortitude Bonus: +1 Fortitude
Wisdom Will Adjustment: -1
Cold Fortitude: +5 vs. cold/Suffers half nonlethal damage from cold
Coldness Of Shadow: Immune to fear
Endurance: +4 extended physical action
Magic
Spell Energy: 2 Spell Slots: B0: 3; B1: 1; Ch5: 1; Domain1: 2 Spell DC: B: 12; Ch: 12; Domain: 9
Spells:
Bane (Shadowed1 Ench): Foes in 50' radius suffer -1 attack and fear saves (DC 13 Will neg) for 10 min
Cause Fear (Death1 Necr): R25' Target w/up to 5 HD flees for 1d4 rd (DC 10 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Continual Flame (Ch2 Evoc): Touched emits heatless torch flame permanently
Death Knell (Shadowed2 Necr): Touched w/negative HP dies, and self gains 1d8 temporary HP, +2 Strength, and +1 caster level for 10*target HD min (DC 14 Will neg)
Detect Evil (Shadowed2 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on evil auras for conc or 100 min
Detect Good (Shadowed2 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on good auras for conc or 100 min
Inflict Light Wounds (Destruction1 Necr): Touched suffer (undead heal) 1d8+1 HP (DC 10 Will half)
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Summon Monster I (Shadowed1 Grea): R50' 1 1st-level creature appears and fights foes for 10 rd
Magic Notes:
Gift Of Izrador: May learn 2 level 1 domain spells
Magecraft (Charismatic): Knows 3 B0 and 1 B1 spells/2 Spell Energy
Spellcasting (Evocation): Knows 1 Channeler Evocation spell and may learn more
Arcane Spell Failure: 10%
Deadly Touch: Touch kills target w/up to 10d6 HP 1/dy
Innate Magic: May use 2 B0 spells as at-will innate abilities
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Shadowed: May use Detect Good 1/dy, Detect Evil 1/dy, Bane 2/dy, Summon Monster I 1/dy, Death Knell 1/dy
